abstract: Federal tax credits for long-term care policies are increasing -- but so are prices.
snippet: Federal tax credits for long-term care policies are increasing -- but so are prices.
lead_paragraph: Desperately searching for any crumb of good news about long-term care, now that the Class Act appears dead, I was glad to get an e-mail from Jesse Slome, executive director of the American Association for Long-Term Care Insurance, pointing out that the I.R.S. is going to allow slightly higher tax deductions in 2012 for the smattering of people who have bought private long-term care policies.

headline.main: Good News and Bad on Long-Term Care
